name: Project Homeless Connect
description: Since their founding in 2004, Project Homeless Connect (PHC) is an organization that partners with city agencies, businesses, and the community to end homelessness in San Francisco. PHC provides access to essential services and care to those who are either: - at risk of becoming homeless - currently experiencing homelessness - transitioning from homelessness to housing
